short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension to help Sprinklr Frontend team review PRs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PR Helper is a Chrome DevTools extension that assists a developer in reviewing merge requests. 

Using this extension a developer can -
1. Create macros that run automatically based on developer actions like approving a PR, merging a PR, etc.
2. It parses the pipeline and shows all the jest, tsc, lint and prettier error and warnings upfront on the PR overview page.
3. Configure GPT prompts
4. Configure comment templates to enable a faster review process
